Package com.example.courseanalyzer.analyzer.finishedcoursesanalyzer

Interface CertificateAnalyzer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleCertificateAnalyzer
    @Service
public interface CertificateAnalyzer
    Extracts the informations from the downloaded file which contains the list of certificates. These certificates are completed courses which also contains the grade of the course.

    This file can be downloaded on TISS-Student Self Service

    .

    These interface is used to conveniently change the implementation because the format of the file may change and a new implementation is necessary.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void analyzeCertificateList​(javax.servlet.ServletRequest request)
      Creates the set of certificates which is extracted from the download request.
      java.util.Set<Course> getCertificates()
      Returns the list of certificates.

    • Method Detail

      • analyzeCertificateList

        void analyzeCertificateList​(javax.servlet.ServletRequest request)
        Creates the set of certificates which is extracted from the download request.

        These list of certificates can be empty, if the file of the request does not meet the format of the file to extract the information.

        Parameters:
        request - the download request
        Throws:
        ReadFileException - is thrown, when an IO problem occurs while reading the passed file.
        WrongFormatException - is thrown, when the format is empty or the text creates an empty list of certificates.

      • getCertificates

        java.util.Set<Course> getCertificates()
        Returns the list of certificates.
        Returns:
        the list of certificates.
